Before we can proceed further with the case, can you please provide us the following information:
- What is the impact of the issue on your business?
- Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried?
- Can you please let me know the Client, Server, OS version (if not already known) on which the issue is encountered?
- On what platform is your Endpoint Protector hosted? (on-prem, AWS, GCP, Azure, Hosted by EPP on AWS)
- Can you check what type of syslogs is Sumologic expecting? (rsyslog or syslog-ng)

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440378 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NRmWN:ref - Troubleshoot SIEM connection between EPP and Sumo Logic [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NRmWN:ref ]
My apologies for the late response,regarding your questions:
- What is the impact of the issue on your business?
It appears that our EPP instance are not sending any logs to Sumo Logic. Our Security Team has confirmed no visible log entries from within the past 30 days
- Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried?
The security team has mentioned they have double checked the values (Security Token and Server Port) that were provided in the EPP console, but issues still persists.
To my knowledge, the issue was noticed last week Thursday.
- Can you please let me know the Client, Server, OS version (if not already known) on which the issue is encountered?
- On what platform is your Endpoint Protector hosted? (on-prem, AWS, GCP, Azure, Hosted by EPP on AWS)
- Can you check what type of syslogs is Sumologic expecting? (rsyslog or syslog-ng)
